definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: mng. dub.; perh. crawling thing, serpent (We:Skizzen iii. 171 cites Ar. Zuḫal = Saturn, in connex. with 1Ki 1:9; cf. Lane & Wetzst in De:Hiob 2, 428 on view that Zuḫal = he who withdraws, because of planet Saturn's remoteness)—only c. art., in design. loc. [[עִם]] [[אֶבֶן הַזּׁחֶלָת]] 1Ki 1:9 (cf. [[אֶבֶן]] ad fin.)
